text: Marcus Montagu Murphy (14 November 1914 — August 2007) was an English footballer who played as an inside forward. ==Career== Murphy's early career was spent in South West England with St Austell, Plymouth & Stonehouse Gas and Plymouth United. During World War II, Murphy guested for Middlesbrough, before returning to Plymouth to sign for Plymouth Argyle. At Plymouth, Murphy made 15 Football League appearances for the club, scoring once. In 1947, following a period in Plymouth's reserves, Murphy signed for Chelmsford City. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Association football forwards Category:English footballers Category:People from Tavistock Category:A.F.C.
